column4: BRIEF-Healthcare Trust Of America Inc Provides Update On Q2 2020 Performance To Date
column5: June 1 (Reuters) - Healthcare Trust Of America Inc:
column6: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA, INC. PROVIDES UPDATE ON Q2 2020 PERFORMANCE TO DATE
column7: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA INC - TOTAL PORTFOLIO OCCUPANCY AS OF END OF MAY WAS 89.9%, WHICH WAS FLAT FROM END OF MARCH
column8: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA - IN APRIL AND MAY, COLLECTED ABOUT 96% OF TOTAL AMOUNT OF RECURRING MONTHLY RENTS THAT ARE CONTRACTUALLY DUE AND OWED
column9: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA - ON QUARTER END, DREW DOWN REMAINING $595 MILLION ON CREDIT FACILITY, INCREASING PRO FORMA CASH POSITION TO ALMOST $800 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Healthcare Trust Of America Reports First Quarter 2020 Earnings
column5: May 5 (Reuters) - Healthcare Trust Of America Inc:
column6: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2020 EARNINGS AND PROVIDES UPDATE ON IMPACTS FROM THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC
column7: * CURRENTLY EXPECT TO COLLECT ALL OF RENT THAT CO AGREES TO DEFER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

column4: BRIEF-Healthcare Trust Of America Qtrly FFO Per Diluted Share $0.40
column5: April 30 (Reuters) - Healthcare Trust Of America Inc :
column6: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS
column7: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA - QTRLY NORMALIZED FFO OF $0.41 PER DILUTED SHARE
column8: * HEALTHCARE TRUST OF AMERICA - QTRLY SAME-PROPERTY CASH NET OPERATING INCOME ROSE 2.3% TO $81.0 MILLION, COMPARED TO Q1 2017
column9: * Q1 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $0.41 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
